LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_AverageStudent.title: 平凡学生
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_AverageStudent.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园平凡学生. 纯纯的路人角色.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_MusicClub.title: 音乐部部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_MusicClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园音乐部部员. 她为了做主唱而付出了很多努力.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_BaseballPlayer.title: 棒球手
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_BaseballPlayer.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园棒球手. 她所在的队伍已经连续五年赢得了全国大赛.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_GardenClub.title: 学园园艺部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_GardenClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园学园园艺部员. 她最喜欢的花是星空百合.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_CatCafe.title: 猫咖雇员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_SculptureClub.title: 雕刻部部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_SculptureClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园雕刻部员. 她最好的作品是《大汗淋漓的No.2VOPN》. 这个作品描绘了一发导弹. 如果你眯眼去看这个雕塑, 不协调的配色展现出了一个葫芦的轮廓.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_CookingClub.title: 安妮莉特丝烹饪部部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_CookingClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园烹饪部部员. 每次在情人节之前她都很忙.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_KarateClub.title: 空手部部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_KarateClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园空手部部员. 练习之后一定要来点果汁.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_OutingClub.title: 安妮莉特丝户外部部员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_OutingClub.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园户外部部员. 她当时真的应该想办法躲开那个食人族营地.
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_StudentAssociation.title: 学生会成员
LanguageData.Anneli_Gakuen_StudentAssociation.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名学园学生会成员. 她的职责就是贯彻学园的风纪.
